review: Heart felt thanks to doctor, who helped me in delivering a baby boy on November 30. She made my pregnancy journey smooth & comfortable. No unnecessary tests or medicines. Only attention to required was prioritised. Till the end doctor was with us handling the complications also smoothly. Happy that we have chosen best gynecologist üëç

review: Am visit 1st time to life care hospital to consult gynecologist. and I consult  Dr. sneha, her  treatment is very good, way treating the patient also good, am quire early, am really fulfill from her treatment, thank you lifecare.

tags: None
review: I had visited Dr Sneha with my wife for family planning advice. We were a newly married couple then. She started asking us absurd questions such as: 1)Are u people really married? 2) Do ur parents know that u are married? etc . I really dont know how she got such rediculous ideas about us. Moreover her behaviour was not at all professional.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Listens patiently to u, but the solution or treatment provided was very disappointing *** ********** If u say, this is happening with u, her answer is ‚Äúit‚Äôs a myth‚Äù... irrespective of u have been experiencing it.
Waste of time and money. Not recommended at all.
